thread.title: Olympics bring calm to heavily-armed Korean border

title: Olympics bring calm to heavily-armed Korean border
text:
Olympics bring calm to heavily-armed Korean border Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:44 
A trip by Reuters' Grace Lee to the heavily-militarized border between the two Koreas before the Winter Games' Opening Ceremony reveals tensions at the lowest they've been in months- and cautious optimism from troops.   
A trip by Reuters' Grace Lee to the heavily-militarized border between the two Koreas before the Winter Games' Opening Ceremony reveals tensions at the lowest they've been in months- and cautious optimism from troops.  //reut.rs/2Ex2him
